channel.title: Weapon binding
channel.description: I have 5 mouse buttons and want to bind weapons to them but they don't seem to be recognized by the game. I have an Anker wireless mouse and want to bind the side buttons.

item.title: Weapon binding
item.dc:creator: vamp
item.description:
1. On steam games library open up properties for black mesa —> startup paramters ----> add “-console”.
    Launch the game and the console should appear.

bind mouse4 “use weapon_”
bind mouse5 “use weapon_”
bind mouse6 “use weapon_”

  1. Alternatively check your mouse driver and see if you can assign another key to those mouse buttons.
    A key black mesa would recognize.

It would be great if the steam options menu would recognize it in black mesa.
Are you having this problem only with BM?
